bug.question: I have six legs and like to crawl. I can be red or black. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I'm very small.
🧺 I can carry crumbs to my home.
🥪 I love picnics!

bug.question: I fly around flowers and make honey. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I love to collect pollen.
🐝 I buzz when I fly.
🍯 I make sweet food.

bug.question: I have spots and fly. Sometimes I land on leaves. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I have round spots.
🐞 People think I bring good luck.
☘️ You can find me near clovers.

bug.question: I jump very high and am often green. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I love to eat grass.
🐸 Some animals like to eat me.
🦗 I make a 'chirp' sound

bug.question: I build a home with silk. Then I become a butterfly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I start as a small, crawling bug.
🧵 My home is made of a soft material.
🦋 I change into something beautiful.

bug.question: I like to bite you when you are sleeping at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I am very small and fly quietly.
🩸 I drink blood.
🌃 I like to come out when it is dark.

bug.question: I have a long body and many legs. I crawl on the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🦶 I have more legs than you do.
🪵 I live under rocks and logs.
🪨 I like dark and damp places.

bug.question: I light up at night. I am a bug. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I glow.
🌙 You see me when it's dark.
✨ I twinkle.

bug.question: I spin a web to catch my food. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is sticky.
🕷️ I have eight legs.
🪰 I eat flies and other bugs.

bug.question: I can walk on water. What bug am I?

hints.text: 💧 I have special feet.
🏞️ I live near ponds and streams.
⛸️ I look like I'm skating.

cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I shine in the day. I help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I give you warmth.
🌻 Plants need me to live.
😎 You need sunglasses to look at me.

cosmos.question: I am round and I go around the Sun. You live here. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 People live here.
💧 I have lots of water.
🌱 Plants grow on me.

cosmos.question: I come out at night. Sometimes I am round, and sometimes I am a crescent. What am I?

hints.text: 🐺 Werewolves like me.
🧀 People think I am made of cheese.
🌚 I reflect light from the Sun.

cosmos.question: I am very hot and far away. I look like a tiny light in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle.
🌌 I am part of a galaxy.
🔥 I make my own light and heat.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of gas, bigger than Earth. I have many moons. What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 I have rings made of ice and rock.
💨 I'm a gas giant.
🔭 You can see me with a telescope.

cosmos.question: I am red and sometimes called the Red Planet. Robots have explored me. What am I?

hints.text: 🤖 Rovers drive on me.
🍫 I have a color similar to some chocolate.
🚀 People want to visit me one day.

cosmos.question: I am a group of many, many stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I can be spiral shaped.
✨ Our solar system is inside me.
🌌 There are billions of me in the Universe.

cosmos.question: I am made of ice and dust, and I have a long tail when I get close to the sun. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I am a space snowball.
💫 My tail points away from the sun.
🧊 I melt a little when I get close to the Sun.

cosmos.question: I'm a smaller piece of rock or metal that orbits the Sun, mainly between Mars and Jupiter. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I am like a small planet.
💥 If I hit Earth, it could cause a big problem.
👨‍🚀 Some scientists want to mine me for resources.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. You can see me at night. What am I?

hints.text: ursa Major and minor is part of me
🏹 Some are named after animals or people from stories.
🌌 People used to use me to navigate.
